user_query: I'm a financial advisor and I'm looking for investment opportunities. Can you provide me with the profitability (ROA ratio) for the financial year of Apple Inc. (AAPL)? Additionally, fetch me the annual dividends of AAPL.

TaskList.description: Fetch the financial data for Apple Inc. (AAPL) to retrieve the ROA ratio for the relevant financial year.
Fetch the annual dividend data for Apple Inc. (AAPL).
